verse.roman:
evaṁ māsaṁ vrataṁ ceruḥ
kumāryaḥ kṛṣṇa-cetasaḥ
bhadrakālīṁ samānarcur
bhūyān nanda-sutaḥ patiḥ

synonyms: evam—in this manner; māsam—an entire month; vratam—their vow; ceruḥ—they executed; kumāryaḥ—the girls; kṛṣṇa-cetasaḥ—their minds absorbed in Kṛṣṇa; bhadra-kālīm—the goddess Kātyāyanī; samānarcuḥ—they properly worshiped; bhūyāt—may He become; nanda-sutaḥ—the son of King Nanda; patiḥ—my husband.
translation: Thus for an entire month the girls carried out their vow and properly worshiped the goddess Bhadrakālī, fully absorbing their minds in Kṛṣṇa and meditating upon the following thought: "May the son of King Nanda become my husband."
